sourcesContent:
import uuid from 'uuid'
import { GET_ITEMS, ADD_ITEM, DELETE_ITEM } from '../actions/types'

const initialState = {
    items: [
        
            {
                id: uuid(),
                name: 'Hebel',
                measured_by: 'm2',
                price: '10000',
                category: 'wall' },
            {
                id: uuid(),
                name: 'Ceramic tile 1',
                measured_by: 'm2',
                price: '12000',
                category: 'floor' },
            {
                id: uuid(),
                name: 'Ceramic tile 2',
                measured_by: 'm2',
                price: '15000',
                category: 'floor' },
            {
                id: uuid(),
                name: 'plaster',
                measured_by: 'm2',
                price: '1000',
                category: 'wall' },
            {
                id: uuid(),
                name: 'Wall paint 1',
                measured_by: 'm2',
                price: '2000',
                category: 'wall' },
            {
                id: uuid(),
                name: 'Wall paint 2',
                measured_by: 'm2',
                price: '2200',
                category: 'wall' },
            {
                id: uuid(),
                name: 'Roof 1',
                measured_by: 'm2',
                price: '200000',
                category: 'roof' },
            {
                id: uuid(),
                name: 'Door 1',
                measured_by: 'unit',
                price: '1000',
                category: 'furniture' },
            {
                id: uuid(),
                name: 'Half window',
                measured_by: 'unit',
                price: '1000',
                category: 'furniture' },
            {
                id: uuid(),
                name: 'Full window',
                measured_by: 'unit',
                price: '1000',
                category: 'furniture' }
        
    ]
}

export default function(state = initialState, action) {
    switch(action.type) {
        case GET_ITEMS:
            return {
                ...state
            }

        case DELETE_ITEM:
            return {
                ...state,
                items: state.items.filter(item => item.id !== action.payload)
            }

        case ADD_ITEM:
            return {
                ...state,
                items: state.items.filter(item => item.id !== action.payload)
            }

        default:
            return state
    }
}
